name: Shen Meng
story: Yan Gong grew up in a rural farming village in China with his two younger siblings. Despite his excellent skills in math and science, his family could not afford to send him to a good school. Yan joined the army as soon as he turned 18 and has quickly risen through the ranks. He is a skilled missile specialist and takes great pride in his work. Yan is reserved and quiet, and finds solace in his practice of Buddhism.
